titleStmt.title: The proceedings of the Grisons, in the yeere 1618 VVherein are truely and cleerely laid open the lawfull and vrgent causes of calling an assembly of the commons: and of their due proceeding and honourable prosecution of iustice, which they were enforced to vse against some false and perfidious patriots, in a full congregation, and with absolute power met together at Tosana. Imprinted and published by commandement of the lords the heads, the counsailours and commons of the three confederations of the renowned free states of the Grisons: in maintenance of the truth, and romoouing all manner of calumniation.
Grawpündtnerische Handlungen des M.DC.XVII. Jahrs. English
titleStmt.author: Graubünden (Switzerland)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Purslowe for E. Blount],

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Grawpündtnerische Handlungen des M.DC.XVII. Jahrs.
Includes articles of the league with Spain.
Printer's and publisher's name from STC.
Running title reads: The proceeding of the Grisons. 1618.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
